size.description: The size (width) of the `<Tray />` when placement is `start` or `end`

placement.description: Placement to determine where the `<Tray />` should display in the viewport

open.description: Whether or not the `<Tray />` is open

defaultFocusElement.description: An element or a function returning an element to focus by default

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| Node
| Window
| ReactElement
| Component
| (() => Node | Window | null | undefined)
| null

contentRef.description: A function that returns a reference to the content element

shouldContainFocus.description: Whether focus should be contained within the `<Tray/>` when it is open

shouldReturnFocus.description: Whether focus should be restored when the `<Tray/>` is closed

shouldCloseOnDocumentClick.description: Should the `<Tray />` hide when clicks occur outside the content

onOpen.description: Callback fired when `<Tray />` content has been mounted in the DOM

onClose.description: Callback fired when `<Tray />` has been unmounted from the DOM

onDismiss.description: Callback fired when the `<Tray />` is requesting to be closed

tsType.name: signature
tsType.raw:
(
  event: React.UIEvent | React.FocusEvent,
  documentClick?: boolean
) => void

mountNode.description:
An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node
for the `<Tray />` (defaults to `document.body`)

insertAt.description: Insert the element at the 'top' of the mountNode or at the 'bottom'

liveRegion.description:
An element, function returning an element, or array of elements that will not be hidden from
the screen reader when the `<Tray />` is open

tsType.name: union
tsType.raw:
| (() => (Element | null)[])
| (() => Element | null)
| (Element | null)[]
| Element
| null

onTransition.description: Callback fired when the <Tray /> transitions in/out

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the <Tray /> transitions in

onEntering.description: Callback fired as the <Tray /> begins to transition in

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the <Tray /> finishes transitioning in

onExit.description: Callback fired right before the <Tray /> transitions out

onExiting.description: Callback fired as the <Tray /> begins to transition out

onExited.description: Callback fired after the <Tray /> finishes transitioning out

transitionOnMount.description:
Run the enter animation when the component mounts, if it is initially
shown

shadow.description: Should the `<Tray />` have a box shadow

title: Tray
